messages.subject: Greetings everyone
messages.msgSnippet: Greeting everyone, Having just joined this e-mail group I would like to introduce myself.  My name is Matt Williams and I am a history student at Florida Gulf
messages.messageBody:
Greeting everyone,

Having just joined this e-mail group I would like to introduce myself. My
name is Matt Williams and I am a history student at Florida Gulf Coast
University. I also study Iaido and Jujutsu. I wrote the article "Warrior
Puppets: The Samurai of the Tokugawa Shogunate" for the Samurai Archives
site. Please feel free to ask anything you wish of me. I look forward to
learning from you wonderful people.


Peace,

Matt Williams
